Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Baltimore in 2008...
Traded from Baltimore to Seattle on 2/4/2011 (Going to SEA: 3B J. Fox, P J. Niemann, 1B E. Hosmer, P B. Fiala. Going to BAL: CF B. Starling)...
Injured on 8/10/2012 with a Sprained Wrist, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/7/2013, off Ian West (MIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/14/2013, off Trevor Cahill (BOS)...
Injured on 8/16/2014 with a Stiff Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Boston on 5/20/2018...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Injured on 4/26/2021 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 3/1/2022 to a minor league contract.
